All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary Annotation Types Summary 
    Class Description
    ActuatorResource
    JAX-RS definition of /actuator endpoints.
    ActuatorResourceAutoConfiguration
    Auto configuration for ActuatorResources.
    AutoProxy
    When applied to JAX-RS Path annotated interfaces, creates a client proxy bean for such interfaces, which can then be auto-wired by type.
    BaseHealthIndicator
    Base interface for Actuator HealthIndicator implementations.
    CORSFilter
    CXF filter that globally allows Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS), but only when the configuration property birch.security.cxf.cors.allow = true.
    CustomOpenAPIFeature
    Custom CXF feature used to initialize OpenAPI.
    EnableREST
    Sets component scan and configuration properties needed to execute auto-configurations that register JAX-RS services and client proxies.
    HealthWrapper
    A wrapper class for Health.
    InternationalizationAutoConfiguration
    General configuration for span-based internationalization.
    JAXRSErrorResponse  
    JAXRSUtils
    Bean that provides JAX-RS convenient utility methods.
    ObjectWrapper<T>
    Utility class to wrap any object for the purpose JAXB binding when transporting over REST
    ResourceClientRequestFilter
    Intercepts all client requests where it is defined and adds all Spannable values that are defined within the current MDC context to the request headers.
    ResourceImplContainerRequestFilter
    Intercepts any requests to any JAX-RS resource implementation in order to add all Spannable values that are available in the request headers to the thread's MDC context.
    ResourceProxyBeanAutoConfiguration
    For each interface in the classpath annotated with both AutoProxy and Path, creates a CXF JAX-RS proxy and registers it with the Spring bean container.
    ResponseError
    Exception for errors that occur during REST/HTTP calls, and are wrapped within Response.getEntity().
    Responses
    REST/HTTP response utilities.
    ServiceDependencyHealthIndicator
    Composite Actuator health indicator that checks all of of a service's dependencies.
    SpanHeadersContainerBean
    Wrapper around the ThreadScopeed SpanHeadersContainer bean.
    SpanningClientInterceptor
    Applies custom headers to CXF JAX-RS clients.
    SpanningContainerRequestFilter
    CXF filter that pulls SpanHeadersContainer from the request on the service side and makes it available to the thread.
    UtilsResource
    Microservices utility endpoints.
    UtilsResourceImpl
    UtilsResource implementation.
